page_content:
Data Download in CSV

Version:MissionOS_2.0

MissionOS has the ability to download data at regular intervals, and this option allows you to generate systematic reports in company-specific formats as needed.

You can download instrument data from a selected instrument or a group of selected instruments in CSV format:

  1. Select a single instrument or a group of instruments.
  2. Click CSV to download the excel data file for a single instrument
  3. If multiple instruments were selected, a popup appears prompting the user to select row-wise or column-wise.
  4. Click Generate to download the corresponding CSV report.

 

 

 

Note:

  • The CSV data download also has options of selecting from master or child instruments.
  • CSV data of multi-type instruments cannot be downloaded.
  • CSV files can also be generated within the data manager when instrument data is viewed. To download CSV file, navigate to Instrumentation > Loading > Download Data. 

For more information on Download Data, also refer to the manual Loading - Download Data

 

To watch the Web User Manual video on Download Data in CSV, simply click on the thumbnail or link below:
